# init(types:)

**Initializer**

Initializes and returns a data detector instance.

## Declaration

```swift
init(types checkingTypes: NSTextCheckingTypes) throws
```

## Parameters

- **checkingTypes**: The checking types. The supported checking types are a subset of the types [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/CheckingType]. Those constants can be combined using the C-bitwise OR operator.

## Return Value

Returns the newly initialized data detector. If an error was encountered returns `nil`, and `error` contains the error.

## Discussion

Currently, the supported data detectors `checkingTypes` are:  [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/CheckingType/date], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/CheckingType/address], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/CheckingType/link], `NSTextCheckingTypePhoneNumber`, and `NSTextCheckingTypeTransitInformation`.



## Related Documentation

- **checkingTypes**: Returns the checking types for the data detector.
